title: openHarmony project-level build-profile configuration
description: This document describes the configuration details of the openHarmony project-level configuration file build-profile.json5.

app.description: OpenHarmony application project-level configuration information, which is shared by all FA/PA modules, including the compilation API level, signature, and product information.

compileSdkVersion.description: Specifies the SDK API version when the OpenHarmony application is compiled. This value determines the value of apiTargetVersion in the HAP package.

compatibleSdkVersion.description: Specifies the lowest SDK API level version compatible with the OpenHarmony application during compilation. This value determines the value of apiCompatibleVersion in the HAP package.

signingConfigs.description: This field contains the signature materials used for modifying the openHarmony application. Multiple signature materials can be configured.

products.description: This field is used to describe different product types defined by the openHarmony application. By default, a default product exists and different signature materials can be specified.

name.description: Defines the product type name of the openHarmony application. By default, there is a product named default.

signingConfig.description: Specifies the signature material used by the product. The current signature material must be the material declared in app/signingConfigs. You can select the signature material based on its name.

modules.description: Describes all modules in the openHarmony application. The module configuration includes the name, path, and target-product association configuration.

srcPath.description: This section describes the source code path of the module. It is the relative path of the current configuration file. The path must contain configurations related to hvigorfile.js and package.json.

name.description: Logical name of a module. The value must be the same as that of moduleName in the config.json/module.json file.

targets.description: Configure the association between the target of the module and the product of the application.

name.description: Name of the module target. The target name must be in the target configuration in build-profile.json5 of the module-level.

applyToProducts.description: Describes which products the target is used for, which means that different products can contain different targets.
